name: Pong Platformer (Teiple)
description:
Note: This is very short game submission for the Pong Jam game jam.

Goal:  Use the Pong ball to interact with your levels and go to the end...

How to play:

+ Use A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow to move left and right,

+ Use Space to spawn the ball (first press) or respawn it immediately (second press).

I hope you like it, thanks for reading.
